roleset.name: cause distance between two things
roleset.note: DISTANCE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'distance' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry. (from distance.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: distance-v: arg1 always reflexive?
example.text: Nevertheless, [Mr. Corry]-1, once named chief executive, didn't waste any time *trace*-1 distancing himself from his former boss, who still has an office on the 62nd floor of the USX tower in Pittsburgh.
example.arg: from his former boss, who still has an office on the 62nd floor of the USX tower in Pittsburgh

roleset.name: be far from
roleset.note: DISTANT-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on SHARP-SRED. (from distant.01-j)

example.name: distant-j
example.text: Location is not the ideal as it is distant from the subway station and restaurants
example.arg: from the subway station and restaurants
